translations: v．使变嫩，使变柔软：通过物理或化学方法使肉类或其他食物变得更易咀嚼和消化。
· Tenderizing the meat before cooking can make it more enjoyable to eat.
在烹饪前使肉变嫩可以让它更好吃。

sentences.sentence: The invention provides a mutton tenderizing agent.
sentences.translation: 本发明提供了一种羊肉嫩化剂。

sentences.sentence: In order to meet the tenderizing requirements for different varieties and parts of the beef, an electrical stimulation instrument was designed in this paper.
sentences.translation: 为了适合不同品种和部位的牛肉嫩化要求，该文研发了一种牛肉电刺激嫩化仪。

sentences.sentence: The tenderizing effects of sodium acid pyrophosphate(SAPP), tetrasodium pyrophosphate(TSPP)and sodium tripolyphosphate(STPP)on beef semitendinos muscle were studied.
sentences.translation: 研究了酸性焦磷酸盐（SAPP）、焦磷酸盐（TSPP）、三聚磷酸盐（STPP）对牛肉半腱肌的嫩化作用。
